cookingTips: For best fries, use a starchy potato like russet and cut them thick and even; double-fry for extra crispiness
Warm cheese curds slightly but keep them separate from gravy until just before serving so they maintain shape
Assemble quickly: hot fries first, then cheese curds, then gravy so the heat slightly softens the curds without melting them completely
